      • onConnectionBound

        protected void onConnectionBound()
        Called when the connection got bound

        This method is called while the connection lock is held.

        The default implementation does nothing.

      • onConnectionConnected

        protected void onConnectionConnected()
        Called when the connection got connected

        This method is called while the connection lock is held.

        The default implementation switches directly to ConnectionState.BOUND

      • onConnectionClosed

        protected void onConnectionClosed()
        Called when the connection got closed

        This method is called while the connection lock is held.

        The default implementation does nothing.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Dispose the connection

        A dispose will also act as a disconnect.

        Connections must be disposed in order to clean up all resources. In the past the Connection.disconnect() call was enough and, if possible, most resources (sockets) should be closed when disconnecting. Still some resources can be re-used and these need to be cleaned up in the Connection.dispose() call.

        Specified by:
        dispose in interface Connection
        Overrides:
        dispose in class BaseConnection

      • handleMessage

        protected abstract void handleMessage(java.lang.Object message)
        Handle a message that came in by the current session.

        Note that the method is called while holding the lock the connection itself.

        Parameters:
        message - the received message

      • sendMessageChecked

        protected void sendMessageChecked(java.lang.Object message)
                           throws NoConnectionException
        Send a message if a connection exists

        Works like sendMessage(Object), but the connection is not established it will throw an exception instead of silently ignoring the fact.

        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        NoConnectionException - thrown in case no connection currently exists
